title: The Phoenix Campaign
description: In the thrilling follow-up to The Phoenix Candidate…Congresswoman Grace Colton’s life is a blur—security, appearances, and a desperately fast ramp-up to the general election. Political consultant Jared Rankin is pulling the strings to win the White House with the Conover-Colton ticket.But Grace and Jared are on unsteady ground. She’s hiding her new relationship with Jared from the public, and she’s hiding a more explosive secret from everyone. Grace believes presidential candidate Sen. Shep Conover deserves to know the truth about her, and when Grace drops her bomb, it prompts squeaky-clean Shep to reveal a secret of his own.The Phoenix Campaign will be released in April 2015.
author: Heidi Joy Tretheway
